Author: floatingtales
Content:
I am vehemently against the two party system. As it will devolve to *for* and *against* mentality, as it is basically affecting the voter-base.

Like say, *if* one party is for stuff like *raising the minimum wage*, the other party would be *very much against it* because there is no value or voter-base to be had if the party has the same stance, if anything you'd be marked as a copycat.

Author: floatingtales
Content:
if we look at the US political landscape:

Democrats
- Pro LGBTQ+
- Pro Obamacare
- Pro Ukraine
- Anti Policing

Republicans
- Anti-LGBTQ+
- Anti Obamacare
- Anti Ukraine (initially)
- Pro Policing

They're all diametrically opposed to each other, because that's how you get voters
